Verses.1:
This letter is from Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the will of God, and our brother Timothy.
	I write this to the church of God in Corinth, and for all the saints throughout Achaia.
Verses.2: May you have grace and peace from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ.
Verses.3: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ. Blessed be the Father of compassion and the God of all comfort.
Verses.4: Our Father comforts us amidst our every trouble. We can then give others, amidst any trouble, the same comfort we have received from God.

Changes: 2024-02-04 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 1-4 based on Greek.
2021-11-07 - Paul Prins: First translation of verses 3-4 based on Greek.
